structure.unit: ARTICLE VIII. AFFORDABLE HOUSING TRUST FUND OF MIAMI-DADE COUNTY, FLORIDA

text.section:
Sec. 17-135. Financial audit of fund.
The County shall provide for an independent financial audit of the Trust each fiscal year and report of such audit. Such report shall describe the amount and source of deposits into, and amount and purpose of withdrawals from the Trust during such fiscal year and the amount and principal and interest paid during such year or any indebtedness to which is pledged and the remaining amount of such indebtedness.
